mendel.event

Class EventProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mendel.event.EventProducer

  • public class EventProducer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class makes it easy to publish events from a client to a server by linking a ClientMessageRouter instance to a EventReactor instance. This helps avoid message wrapping boilerplate every time an event will be sent.
    Author:
    malensek
